data.title: Michael Bell, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Michael Bell stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Michael Bell - Points

Michael Bell scores a career high 19 points (2005)

On December 09, 2005, Michael Bell set his career high in points in a NCAA game. That day he scored 19 points in Fairfield Stags's home loss against Loyola (MD) Greyhounds, 85-90. He also had 3 rebounds. He shot 3/4 from two, 3/5 from three, shooting at 66.7% from the field. He also shot 4/5 from the free-throw line.

Michael Bell - Rebounds

Michael Bell grabs a career high 8 rebounds (2006)

On February 25, 2006, Michael Bell set his career high in rebounds in a NCAA game. That day he grabbed 8 rebounds in Fairfield Stags's home loss against Marist Red Foxes, 61-67. He also had 14 points, 1 assist, 1 steal.

Michael Bell - Assists

Michael Bell gives a career high 4 assists (2004)

On December 30, 2004, Michael Bell tied his career high in assists in a NCAA game. That day he dished 4 assists in Fairfield Stags's road loss against Niagara Purple Eagles, 86-74. He also had 7 points, 1 rebound.

Michael Bell - Steals

Michael Bell has a career high 3 steals (2005)

On December 30, 2005, Michael Bell set his career high in steals in a NCAA game. That day he reached 3 steals in Fairfield Stags's road win against Cal State Northridge Matadors, 65-66. He also had 8 points.

Michael Bell - Blocks

Michael Bell blocks a career high 1 shot (2006)

On February 07, 2006, Michael Bell set his career high in blocks in a NCAA game. That day he went for 1 block in Fairfield Stags's road loss against Siena Saints, 58-47. He also had 1 rebound and 1 assist.

Michael Bell - Efficiency

Michael Bell records a career high 19 efficiency rating (2006)

On February 25, 2006, Michael Bell set his career high in efficiency in a NCAA game. That day he accomplished 19 efficiency in Fairfield Stags's home loss against Marist Red Foxes, 61-67. He also had 14 points, 8 rebounds and 1 assist.
